attributes.long-description:
Awarding winning PRPG from Tasty Poison Games is now on 'PS Vita'!

Pocket RPG is a dual-stick action dungeon-crawler. Choose your class and go!

Blade Master
A duel wielding melee specialist. He survives by clearing swathes of enemies with swings and mighty strikes. Devastating special moves which skillful players will be able to use to decimate their foes.

Dark Ranger
A deadly Archer who can summon waves of arrows that bounce, seek and split. Perforate your enemies with dense walls of arrowy death.

Battle Mage
Powerful, but fragile, a nuker who controls the forces of fire, ethereal, ice and lightning to obliterate groups of enemies. Charge up her spells and unleash maximum destruction.

Each quest in Pocket RPG is a new adventure. The hero starts at level zero with an empty satchel and collects items rapidly building their strength to dizzying proportions. In PRPG items matter and the way you use them is even more important.


Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1 player(s)
1000KB Minimum
Touchscreen

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.
